trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat steels herself for the ride to find your next trading partner.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Mablu.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_TODO_01<tab>Give the fine hatchet to Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_TODO_02<tab>Harvest verdant mate leaves.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the verdant mate leaves to Miplu.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_001<tab>We've been doing so well! Even Tobli would have to agree...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_005<tab>Before we get moving... You should be the one to hold this.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_006<tab>With that, I suppose we should hop on the alpacas Mablu has so kindly provided...

TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_010<tab>If I'm going to catch a wild alpaca after this, I can't be shying away from the tame ones. Not that I'm scared of them, you understand. Or their nasty, disgusting, foul-smelling spit...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_015<tab>Ready to go? Let's mount up!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_Q10_000_000<tab>Begin the alpaca ride?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_500<tab>And it's off to the mate fields we go!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_501<tab>Please don't spit, please don't spit...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_502<tab>You'll be fine! These ones are accustomed to people!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_503<tab>I still don't trust them...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_504<tab>You have a knack for riding, no matter what you say!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_505<tab>Without our alpaca friends, we Pelu would never have become traveling merchants. Can you imagine walking all the way across Tural?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_506<tab>I swear, that mountain is too tall to be real.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_507<tab>Worqor Zormor... Wasn't that the name?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_508<tab>A forbidding sight, isn't it? One I've never appreciated up close.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_509<tab>You have to take the long way around the cliffs to get there─to the highlands belonging to the Yok Huy.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_510<tab>So, Mablu, you said you were learning about the peddler profession. You don't care for ranch work?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_511<tab>No, no, I love it! I love working with alpacas!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_512<tab>But becoming a peddler has always been a dream of mine.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_513<tab>It's just... I'm not sure I have the talent for it.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_514<tab>If I can help you buy the taming saddle, though, then it'd be proof that I can do this after all.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_515<tab>In that case, you'd best get ready to be a merchant!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_516<tab>Look, we're almost there!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_017<tab>We made it...and without a single smelly incident.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_100_019<tab>I sent the alpacas back to Icuvlo's Inn, so we'll walk along the main road when we return to the village.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_018<tab>Speaking of roads to travel... You were adopted by the Dawnservant, weren't you, Third Promise?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_019<tab>That I was.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_020<tab>Then perhaps you understand. I was an orphan too, you see─Tobli took me in. He took in all the ranch hands, actually.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_021<tab>All of them?

TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_022<tab>Yes, and everyone works hard at their chores, grateful for the opportunity to repay the head ledger's generosity. Yet here I am, the only one wanting to go off and be a merchant...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_023<tab>I'm sorry, I don't know why I'm telling you this! We need to keep trading things for your saddle if you're to prepare for the Feat of Gold.

TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_024<tab>As it's mate harvesting season, they can't have too many quality hatchets. Add to that Wuk Lamat's way with people, and we should have no trouble making a favorable deal.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_025<tab>That's Miplu herself over there! Pass the hatchet to the Third Promise, and let's get to bargaining!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_030<tab>Did you give the hatchet back to Wuk Lamat? We should let her do the talking.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_035<tab>To what do I owe this honor...?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>You have that little axe for me?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_041<tab>Thanks! Now to see what we can get for it...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_042<tab>You're Miplu, the owner of these fields? I have a mind to trade, if you're interested.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_043<tab>Well, well, the Third Promise! I might be convinced to entertain a proposal. What do you have on offer?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_044<tab>This hatchet! Forged by a seasoned artisan, the razor edge of this exceptional tool will make light work of your crops!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_045<tab>Hrm... The quality is acceptable, I suppose. I offer you a large sack of mate leaves in exchange.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_046<tab>A sack of mate leaves is valued at one pel in the thousands column─the same price as the hatchet. This deal would bring us no closer to the mezcal...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_047<tab>If I may, Mistress Miplu. It's harvesting season, is it not? Does not the demand for hatchets afford them a higher value?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_048<tab>It is indeed the season. Which is why I procured an ample batch of tools well in advance.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_049<tab>We've missed the window for demand... In that case, we'll have to fall back on connections.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_050<tab>Think of it this way! A generous deal here will put you in the Third Promise's good graces. Surely that's worthy of consideration?

TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_051<tab>I do not wish to give offense, but I must tell you that I stand with the Second Promise. His innovations will improve every aspect of our lives, I believe─including farming. And I will no longer have need of hatchets.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_052<tab>I assure you that I have nothing but respect for Wuk Lamat. That is why I'm prepared to purchase a spare hatchet at a fair price.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_053<tab>I-I suppose it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> fair given your reasons. But we ourselves would be no better off for the transaction...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_054<tab>How about this, then. If we were to help bring in your harvest, would you give us a better deal?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_055<tab>As a matter of fact, I would! Until Koana's reforms come about, I can always use more hands in the fields.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_056<tab>Then you can go ahead and add our labor to the bargain!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_057<tab>Added value to tip the scales... How could I have forgotten one of the most basic rules of trading?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_058<tab>You can rest here if you like, Mablu. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I have mate to gather!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_059<tab>Oh no, I'm helping too!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_060<tab>Off to the fields, then, and mind you pick the healthy leaves. I'll take five good bundles from each of you.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>I wasn't sure Miplu would bite, but it goes to show that you never know until you try!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_075<tab>Did you see how Wuk Lamat came to my rescue there? She really is good with people...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_080<tab>You've brought me some leaves, then?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_081<tab>An acceptable harvest. We'll see how your companions fared before I make any decisions, though.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_082<tab>Here, we've brought our share as well.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_083<tab>Thank you, Third Promise. This is more than enough to hold up your end of the bargain.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_084<tab>Now it's time to honor mine. After adding the value of your labor to the price of the hatchet...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_085<tab>I am prepared to offer you a full sack of our highest-grade mate leaves!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_086<tab>Premium mate! Bought at the shop, one sack of those leaves would cost no less than five pel in the thousands column!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_087<tab>Then we can bid farewell to this hatchet.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MIPLU_000_088<tab>I'll give it a good home. Talk of the contest aside, I'm glad we could come to a mutually agreeable trade.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_089<tab>As am I! All the best with the rest of your harvest!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>Mablu? What's wrong?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_091<tab>It's as I was saying before... Even after everything Tobli's done for me, I'm planning to abandon it all and become a merchant.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_092<tab>But then I needed your help after forgetting a basic rule of trade. How can I expect Tobli to accept my decision then...?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_A1_000_001<tab>Have you mentioned your plans to leave?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_A1_000_002<tab>So you intend to give up, then?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_094<tab>Not exactly. I wanted to prove I could succeed as a peddler before I declared my intentions...
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_095<tab>I can't! After getting a taste of real trading, I want to be a merchant more than ever!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_096<tab>Then you'll just have to be honest.

TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_097<tab>I seek to follow in my father's footsteps, but not because he expects it of me. I want to preserve Tural's peace, and becoming Dawnservant happens to be the best way to do it.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_098<tab>You should live a life of your own choosing, and I wouldn't be surprised if Tobli held the same opinion. So talk to him.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_099<tab>...You're right! It's better to find out for sure than worry over what he might say! Thank you for the advice.
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_100<tab>But first, we have a saddle to buy. I want that success under my belt so I can be sure of my decision!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_101<tab>What's next, then? We try to trade our tea leaves for something halfway to ten thousand pel?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_102<tab>No, I think we're close enough now. I say we go straight for the premium mezcal!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_103<tab>Bargain our way into double the value, eh? Think you can do it?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_104<tab>Trust me! I will make this trade work!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_MABLU_000_105<tab>I admire you, Third Promise. That you're holding your own against such strong competition for the throne is inspiring!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_100_105<tab>Uh... Am I really holding my own against Koana and Zoraal Ja...?
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_WUKLAMAT_000_106<tab>I-I mean, of course I am! I'm Wuk Lamat of the Dawn's Promise, after all!
TEXT_KINGMA115_04874_SYSTEM_000_107<tab>Success! You traded a thousand pel hatchet for a five thousand pel sack of top-grade mate leaves!
